title: arey
instructions: Soak lentils and kidney beans overnight. Drain and rinse.
Cook lentils and beans in a pressure cooker with salt and water until soft.
In a pan, heat butter and add cumin seeds. Let them splutter.
Add onions and saut√© until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato puree, garam masala, and chili powder. Cook until the oil separates.
Add the cooked lentils and beans. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with naan or rice.
